name: PanelSpriteContinuousBar
shortDescription: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
description: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
There are ready-to-use resource bars in the asset-store [resource bars pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=resource-bars-resource-bars).

changelog.breaking: - Resource bars now use variants, you will have to make some adjustments to existing resource bars in your project by following this [migration documentation](https://wiki.gdevelop.io/gdevelop5/objects/custom-objects-prefab-template/migrate-to-variants/).

events.comment: Anchors won't work as there is an absolute margin and a proportional size at the same time
This allows to detect a change of "intial value" on hot reload.
Create the label over the bar.
Pass the configuration to the behavior.

eventsFunctions.description: Center the bar according to the button configuration. This is used in doStepPostEvents when the button is resized.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateLayout
